targets.rawSql: SELECT users.long_name, users.did as Did FROM users AS u LEFT OUTER JOIN users ON u.gateway_id = users.did WHERE u.did = $nodeId

targets.query: SELECT count("id")/15 FROM "raw" WHERE ("gateway_id"::tag =~ /^$nodeId$/ OR "idName"::tag =~ /^$nodeId$/) AND time > now() - 15m
SELECT cumulative_sum(count("gateway_id")) FROM "raw" WHERE ("idName" =~ /^$nodeId$/) AND $timeFilter  GROUP BY time(1m), "gateway_id"
SELECT last("payload"), last("gateway_id"), last("portnum"), last("id") FROM "raw" WHERE ("idName" =~ /^$nodeId$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("payload"), last("gateway_id"), last("portnum"), last("id") FROM "raw" WHERE ("idName" =~ /^$nodeId$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.definition:
SELECT
    concat(long_name, ' ', hw_model, ' !', to_hex(did))  AS "__text", did AS "__value"
FROM
  users
list.label: Node Name
list.name: nodeId
list.query:
SELECT
    concat(long_name, ' ', hw_model, ' !', to_hex(did))  AS "__text", did AS "__value"
FROM
